description:
Rubeus succeeds in taking four of the five Sailor Guardians prisoner. He then demands that Sailor Moon bring Chibi-Usa and the Silver Crystal to him in exchange for the girls` lives.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Defeat Rubeus: The Battle in Space
Rubeus o Taose! Uchuukuukan no Kessen
Малышка, ты молодец! Битва в космосе
ルベウスを倒せ! 宇宙空間の決戦
